definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
high in score but low in ability (as a result of teaching to the test)

sentences.chinese: 阿甘是個智商只有75的低能兒。

sentences.english: Scientists can observe how organisms work together in low-energy sites.
sentences.chinese: 科學家可以觀察有機體在低能養地區如何互動。

sentences.english: A hold created with a hamer and chisel by a moron uncapable of doing the climb as it is.
sentences.chinese: 用鎚子或鑿子鑿出來的把手點，是一種低能的行爲。

sentences.english: The result is that Chinese college graduates often have high scores but low ability.
sentences.chinese: 結果是，中國的大學畢業生通常高分低能。

sentences.english: Are we all so unintelligent that we need an elitist to comment on national affairs?
sentences.chinese: 我們都是些低能兒，需要精英來指點江山？

sentences.english: Refrigeration by means of negative heat of dissolution of inorganic salts is a low consumption cooling method.
sentences.chinese: 採用無機鹽的負溶解熱製冷是一種低能耗的製冷方法。

sentences.english: He made Naruto look like a total moron.
sentences.chinese: 他使鳴人變得像一個低能者。

sentences.english: He was born subnormal and will never learn to speak.
sentences.chinese: 他天生低能，學不會講話。

sentences.english: Another reason, then, to switch to low-energy light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 氣候變化也是改用低能耗燈泡的原因之一。

sentences.english: Low power, no radialization interfere, high shake-resistance.
sentences.chinese: 低能耗，無輻射，高抗震性。

sentences.english: The method of detecting the low-energy scattering, neutron background was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了扣除低能散射中子本底的方法。

sentences.english: This school is for subnormal children.
sentences.chinese: 這所學校是爲低能兒童開的。

sentences.english: Optical fiber allows low-power signals to travel farther faster.
sentences.chinese: 光纖允許低能信號傳輸得更遠更快。

sentences.english: By using geothermal energy the whole building reaches low energy standard.
sentences.chinese: 通過使用地熱能，整個建築達到了低能耗標準。

sentences.english: We discuss the low-energy excitation of nuclear spins in quantum dots.
sentences.chinese: 我們討論了量子點中核自旋的低能激發問題。

sentences.english: The consumer is not a moron.

definition: high in score but low in ability (as a result of teaching to the test)
person who is ignorant about science and technology/scientific illiteracy
to have lost one's mind/crazy/soft in the head
pseudoscientist/crank/crackpot (abbr. for 民間科學家|民间科学家)
not one good point/everything about it is wrong
